dcterms:description: The SUPER-NATURALINSTRUCTION (NIv2) dataset comprises 757 training tasks and 119 unseen test tasks, designed to evaluate the effectiveness of task definitions in instruction learning.
dcterms:title: SUPER-NATURALINSTRUCTION (NIv2)
